installCommand: npm install -g pnpm@10.7.0 && cd x402/typescript && pnpm install
buildCommand: cd x402/typescript && pnpm --filter @x402/core build && pnpm --filter @x402/evm build && pnpm --filter @x402/svm build && pnpm --filter @x402/next build && pnpm --filter @x402/paywall build && cd site && pnpm build
